<p>This is Tw1’s Kerbal faceship. Stare into it. Feel the awesome. Are you feeling it yet? Look at it straight in the eyes. What a beauty.</p>
Hey TW1, didn't know you liked TVTropes.

Oh hey! This is a cool surprize.

Still working on that thing actually, it has a body now.

Hey TW1, didn't know you liked TVTropes.

Yep! I have spent ages on that site. So much awesome stuff to learn and discover.

Edited February 9, 2014 by Deathsoul097

Pic's broke.

This is what I think you wanted to post.

-Note: That giant robot right there? It's standing on a galaxy in an alternate dimension, fighting another giant robot the same size (Galaxy Sized) by throwing galaxies at each other, and condensing galaxies into pure energy, and firing it at each other. Yeah. ANIME!-

That's not even the largest the mechs get.

Wow, that face is terrifying. You could make KSP into a horror game by having these things blink in and out at random intervals whilst you were in orbit. They would get closer and closer... and then BAM! You would be Kraken'ed out into a solar-system escape trajectory. [Note to Devs: Please don't do this.]

Anyway.

I actually built a humanoid plane back in 0.17, that was kind of awesome, kind of derpy and really very difficult to fly. Here's a YouTube link [warning: audio is quiet, plane noise is loud, video is improperly cropped and it's really not a great video. With that in mind...]

http://youtu.be/-dINU2terY0
How did you get the multicolored spacesuit?
